refnamediv.refpurpose: Read the real time clock from the operating system.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Read the real-time clock from the operating system.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Read the real-time clock from operating system. Under Windows, this changes only once per second. Under GNU/Linux, it ticks every microsecond. Performance under other systems varies.
